price: រាល់ពាក្យសំដីដែលគេនិយាយចេញមក គឺមានអ្នកឃ្លាំ មើល និងកត់ត្រា(ម៉ាឡាអ៊ីកាត់)។
arabic: مَّا يَلۡفِظُ مِن قَوۡلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيۡهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٞ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: mā yalfiẓu min qawlin illā ladayhi raqībun ʿatīdun
